content: this is a very fast project to make this would be ideal for gifts or craft show items you could attach your owl to a key chain or a back pack clip i bought the colored key chain rings at wal-mart or you can get them at your local craft shop i kept the pattern very simple so you could just glance at it when you need to and know what to do i would love to see pictures as always share your projects and color ideas with everyone please **august 6 2015 - sending out a huge thank you to jonna martinez for making a youtube video for this pattern she used a baby weight size 3 yarn and a smaller hook to achieve a smaller owl keychain here is a link to her video tutorial https //youtu be/apxioemifew** **april 19th 2013 - i want to say a huge thank you to karin skog of sweden who translated the owl key chain pattern to swedish it is now included in the ravelry downloads karin you are awesome ** **april 28 2014 - new version of the pattern is now available in german thank you so much georgia for translating the pattern for us it is now included in ravelry downloads georgia you rock ** ****august 10 2014- there is a translation mistake in the german pattern in the last row it must be doppelstäbchen instead of dreifachstäbchen dreifachstäbchen=double triplecrochet doppelstäbchen=triplecrochet thank you so much to nina for this correction ** **sept 19 2014 - thank you so much to anne for translating the key chain pattern to dutch you are amazing i am honored that there have been such gracious women that were willing to do this thank you again karin georgia nina and anne d** have fun rachel
